review_text: Good Product

Excellent phone. Received today with 1 day delivery at no extra cost. I upgraded from Redmi Note 8 pro to this one. Apps.and settings transfer was seamless, fast and easy. No heating while charging and playing videos simultaneously. Battery backup is good. So far performance is quite satisfactory. I will update after few weeks of usage
